<Heading as={"h1"} className={"openapi__heading"} children={"URL パスで関数を実行する"} />

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/run/{*functionIdentifier}"} context={"endpoint"} />

URL パスでクエリ、ミューテーション、またはアクション関数を実行します。

<Heading id={"request"} as={"h2"} className={"openapi-tabs__heading"} children={"リクエスト"} />

<ParamsDetails parameters={[{"name":"functionIdentifier","in":"path","description":"messages/list のような関数のパス","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]} />

<RequestSchema title={"ボディ"} body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["args"],"properties":{"args":{"type":"object"},"format":{"type":["string","null"]}},"title":"UdfPostRequestArgsOnly"}}},"required":true}} />


<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"oneOf":[{"type":"object","required":["value","status"],"properties":{"logLines":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"status":{"type":"string","enum":["success"]},"value":{"title":"値"}}},{"type":"object","required":["errorMessage","status"],"properties":{"errorData":{"oneOf":[{"type":"null"},{"title":"値"}]},"errorMessage":{"type":"string"},"logLines":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"status":{"type":"string","enum":["error"]}}}],"title":"UdfResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
